GetAllApplicationTypes.response_notes: Array of objects with Id (integer) and ApplicationTitle (string)

GetAllCommitteesForFilter.response_notes: Array of objects with Id (UUID) and Name (string)

GetAllCouncils.response_notes: Array with Id, Name, TypeId (integer), and TypeTitle
excerpts: Response: array of {"Id": UUID, "Name": string, "TypeId": integer, "TypeTitle": string}

GetAllGenders.request_notes: Simple request with methodName and languageId
GetAllGenders.response_notes: Array of gender options with Id (integer) and Title (string)

GetAllInstitutionsForFilter.response_notes: Array of institutions with Id (UUID) and Title, may include placeholder entries
excerpts: Description: Institutions (ministries, etc.). May include placeholder entries (Title: "/")

GetAllMPsClubsByStructure.response_notes: Array of MP clubs with Id (UUID) and Name

GetAllMaterialStatusesForFilter.response_notes: Array of material status options with Id and Title

GetAllMaterialTypesForFilter.response_notes: Array of material type options with Id (integer) and Title

GetAllMaterialsForPublicPortal.request_notes: Complex request with pagination, filters, and search parameters. Uses MethodName capitalization
GetAllMaterialsForPublicPortal.response_notes: Paginated response with TotalItems and Items array containing detailed material objects
excerpts: Request includes: MethodName, LanguageId, ItemsPerPage, CurrentPage, SearchText, AuthorText, MaterialTypeId, StructureId, and multiple filter options
Response: {"TotalItems": integer, "Items": array} with detailed material objects including Id, Title, Status, Authors, etc.
